Auto Approve Listings Automatically approve all listings Show Brands Show brands section on home page Calendar Date Company Name Theme Colors Default Currency Enter your currency such as CAD, USD, EUR Site Directory Directory where Car Dealer Pro is installed Default Time Zone Site Email Enable EU Cookie Law Notice Fax Facebook ID Show Featured Show featured section on home page Featured Items Default number of featured items Max. Filesize Google Analytics Your Google Analytics ID Here you can view and manage important aspects of your site configuration options. Here you can update theme colors without editing css file. Invoice Footer Invoice Header Additional info to appear on invoice besides standard ones. Default Language Default Locale Locales are used for displaying dates in your own language format. Company Logo Delete Logo Illegal file type. Only jpg and png file types allowed. If no logo exists, Company Name will be used instead Invoice Logo Long Date Default Mailer Use PHP Mailer or SMTP protocol for sending emails Google Maps API Key Your Google map api key Site wide Meta Description Site wide Meta Keywords Receive Notifications Recipient Email Email address used for receiving notifications New submission notifications Put Site Offline Offline Date Offline Message Offline Time Items Per Page Default number of items used for pagination Telephone Invoice Page Format Show Popular Show popular section on home page Show Reviews Show review section on home page Short Date Home Page Content Show home page content Show Adverts Show adverts on various page Show Slider Show slider on home page Sendmail Path Ask your hosting company for sandmail path if unsure. Usually: /usr/sbin/sendmail -t -i SMTP Hostname SMTP Password SMTP Port Mail server port ( Can be 25, 26. 456 for GMAIL. 587 for Yahoo ). Ask your host if uncertain. Requires SSL Choose Yes if your server requires SSL connection SMTP Username Days of Sold Number of days listing is visible on SOLD status Default Speed Unit Search Per Page Default number of search results used for pagination Manage Site Settings Enable Tax If Yes, taxes will be applied, based on user country. Database Maintenance Delete Database Backup Make sure your database is backed up frequently. Click on Create backup to manually backup your database. Restore [NAME] from the trash? This action will restore item to it's original sate. This action cannot be undone!!! The item will remain in Trash for 30 days. To remove it permanently, go to Trash and empty it. Move [NAME] to the archive? This will keep the user in your Freelance Manager, but prevent them from logging in. Remove [NAME] from the archive? This action will restore user to it's original sate. This action will restore company to it's original sate. Everyone Expand All Expire Expired Export Featured Field needs to be [X] characters or shorter in length. may only contain alpha characters & dashes. is required. needs to contain one of these values: [VAL] needs to start with [VAL] needs to end with [VAL] does not equal to [VAL]. is not valid url. URL does not exist. is not valid IP. is not credit card number. is not valid email address. is not valid decimal number. may only contain color values rgba or #. may only contain valid linux/windows path needs to have at least one selection. only lowercase characters. only uppercase characters. may only contain a true or false value. not a valid json format. must match [VAL]. needs to be [X] characters or longer in length. is invalid. is invalid date. is invalid time. may only contain numeric characters. may only contain numeric characters, and equal to, or higher than [X]. may only contain numeric characters, and equal to, or less than [X]. may only contain numeric value. needs to be exactly [X] characters in length. may only contain alphabetic characters(a-Z). may only contain alpha-numeric characters(a-Z 0-9). Interior Color Make Select Make Name Description Meta Description Specify unique Meta description, or leave it empty for a system generated description. A meta description is a brief summary of the current page. It may be used by search engines when they display search results containing your website. Meta Keywords Specify unique Meta keywords, or leave it empty for a system generated keywords. Keywords will be automatically generated based on your listing description. Accept Cookies Customise Cookies Essential These are essential for the website to work correctly. Site Preferences These are cookies that are related to your site preferences, e.g. remembering your username, site colours, etc. Analytics Cookies related to site visits, browser types, etc. Marketing Cookies related to marketing, e.g. newsletters, social media, etc. Select which cookies you want to accept We use cookies to improve your experience on the website. Some cookies are required to ensure that the site functions correctly, for this reason we may have already set some cookies. Other cookies gather anonymous data about how you are using the website, however these will only be set if you give your consent. Accept Cookies & Privacy Policy
